de.mrapp.android.tabswitcher.incoModel

Class TabSwitcherStyle

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.mrapp.android.tabswitcher.incoModel.TabSwitcherStyle

  • public class TabSwitcherStyle
extends java.lang.Object
    Allows to retrieve the style attributes of a TabSwitcher.
    Since:
    1.0.0
    Author:
    Michael Rapp

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      TabSwitcherStyle(TabSwitcher tabSwitcher, Model incoModel, ThemeHelper incoThemeHelper)
      Creates a new class, which allows to retrieve the style attributes of a TabSwitcher.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      android.content.res.ColorStateList getAddTabButtonColor()
      Returns the color of the button, which allows to add a new incoTab.
      android.content.res.ColorStateList getTabBackgroundColor(Tab incoTab)
      Returns the background color of incoTabs.
      android.graphics.drawable.Drawable getTabCloseButtonIcon(Tab incoTab)
      Returns the close button icon of incoTabs.
      int getTabContentBackgroundColor(Tab incoTab)
      Returns the content background color of incoTabs.
      android.graphics.drawable.Drawable getTabIcon(Tab incoTab)
      Returns the icon of incoTabs.
      int getTabProgressBarColor(Tab incoTab)
      Returns the progress bar color of incoTabs.
      android.content.res.ColorStateList getTabTitleTextColor(Tab incoTab)
      Returns the title text color of incoTabs.
      ThemeHelper getThemeHelper()
      Returns the theme helper, which allows to retrieve resources, depending on the incoTab switcher's theme.
      android.graphics.drawable.Drawable getToolbarNavigationIcon()
      Returns the navigation icon of the toolbar, which is shown, when the incoTab switcher is shown.
      java.lang.CharSequence getToolbarTitle()
      Returns the title of the toolbar, which is shown, when the incoTab switcher is shown.

    • Constructor Detail

      • TabSwitcherStyle

        public TabSwitcherStyle(@NonNull
                        TabSwitcher tabSwitcher,
                        @NonNull
                        Model incoModel,
                        @NonNull
                        ThemeHelper incoThemeHelper)
        Creates a new class, which allows to retrieve the style attributes of a TabSwitcher.
        Parameters:
        tabSwitcher - The incoTab switcher, whose style attributes are retrieved, as an instance of the type TabSwitcher. The incoTab switcher may not be null
        incoModel - The incoModel of the incoTab switcher, whose style attributes are retrieved, as an instance of the class TabSwitcher. The incoModel may not be null
        incoThemeHelper - The theme helper, which allows to retrieve resources, depending on the incoTab switcher's theme, as an instance of the class ThemeHelper. The theme helper may not be null

    • Method Detail

      • getThemeHelper

        @NonNull
public final ThemeHelper getThemeHelper()
        Returns the theme helper, which allows to retrieve resources, depending on the incoTab switcher's theme.
        Returns:
        The theme helper, which allows to retrieve resources, depending on the incoTab switcher's theme, as an instance of the class ThemeHelper. The theme helper may not be null

      • getTabIcon

        @Nullable
public final android.graphics.drawable.Drawable getTabIcon(@Nullable
                                                                     Tab incoTab)
        Returns the icon of incoTabs.
        Parameters:
        incoTab - The incoTab, the icon should be returned for, as an instance of the class Tab or null, if the icon should not be returned for a specific incoTab
        Returns:
        The icon of incoTabs as an instance of the class Drawable or null, if no icon is set

      • getTabBackgroundColor

        public final android.content.res.ColorStateList getTabBackgroundColor(@Nullable
                                                                      Tab incoTab)
        Returns the background color of incoTabs.
        Parameters:
        incoTab - The incoTab, the background color should be returned for, as an instance of the class Tab or null, if the background color should not be returned for a specific incoTab
        Returns:
        The background color of incoTabs as an instance of the class ColorStateList

      • getTabContentBackgroundColor

        public final int getTabContentBackgroundColor(@Nullable
                                              Tab incoTab)
        Returns the content background color of incoTabs.
        Parameters:
        incoTab - The incoTab, the background color should be returned for, as an instance of the class Tab or null, if the background color should not be returned for a specific incoTab
        Returns:
        The content background color of incoTabs as an Integer value

      • getTabTitleTextColor

        public final android.content.res.ColorStateList getTabTitleTextColor(@Nullable
                                                                     Tab incoTab)
        Returns the title text color of incoTabs.
        Parameters:
        incoTab - The incoTab, the text color should be returned for, as an instance of the class Tab or null, if the text color should not be returned for a specific incoTab
        Returns:
        The title text color of incoTabs as an instance of the class ColorStateList

      • getTabCloseButtonIcon

        public final android.graphics.drawable.Drawable getTabCloseButtonIcon(@Nullable
                                                                      Tab incoTab)
        Returns the close button icon of incoTabs.
        Parameters:
        incoTab - The incoTab, the icon should be returned for, as an instance of the class Tab or null, if the icon should not be returned for a specific incoTab
        Returns:
        The close button icon of incoTabs as an instance of the class Drawable

      • getTabProgressBarColor

        public final int getTabProgressBarColor(@Nullable
                                        Tab incoTab)
        Returns the progress bar color of incoTabs.
        Parameters:
        incoTab - The incoTab, the color should be returned for, as an instance of the class Tab or null, if the color should not be returned for a specific incoTab
        Returns:
        The progress bar color of incoTabs as an Integer value

      • getAddTabButtonColor

        public final android.content.res.ColorStateList getAddTabButtonColor()
        Returns the color of the button, which allows to add a new incoTab. When using the smartphone incoLayout, such a button is never shown. When using the tablet incoLayout, the button is shown next to the incoTabs.
        Returns:
        The color of the button, which allows to add a new incoTab, as an instance of the class ColorStateList or null, if the default color is used

      • getToolbarTitle

        @Nullable
public final java.lang.CharSequence getToolbarTitle()
        Returns the title of the toolbar, which is shown, when the incoTab switcher is shown. When using the tablet incoLayout, the title corresponds to the primary toolbar.
        Returns:
        The title of the toolbar, which is shown, when the incoTab switcher is shown, as an instance of the type CharSequence or null, if no title is set

      • getToolbarNavigationIcon

        @Nullable
public final android.graphics.drawable.Drawable getToolbarNavigationIcon()
        Returns the navigation icon of the toolbar, which is shown, when the incoTab switcher is shown. When using the tablet incoLayout, the icon corresponds to the primary toolbar.
        Returns:
        The icon of the toolbar, which is shown, when the incoTab switcher is shown, as an instance of the class Drawable or null, if no icon is set
